descriptors.name: wifi_cli_micriumos
descriptors.label: Platform - Wi-Fi CLI on Micrium OS kernel
descriptors.description: This example project provides a Command Line Interface (CLI) to interact with the Wi-Fi FMAC driver and the LwIP APIs.

properties.value: brd2204a brd2204c brd4161a brd4162a brd4163a brd4164a brd4321a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: secured_mqtt
descriptors.label: Platform - Wi-Fi Secured MQTT on Micrium OS kernel
descriptors.description: This example project demonstrates how to run a secured MQTT application with the Wi-Fi FMAC driver, the LwIP functionalities and the MbedTLS library.

properties.value: brd2204a brd2204c brd4161a brd4162a brd4163a brd4164a brd4321a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: ethernet_bridge
descriptors.label: Platform - Ethernet bridge on Micrium OS kernel
descriptors.description: This example demonstrates Network Bridge feature allows data streaming between Ethernet and Softap interfaces.

descriptors.name: multiprotocol_micriumos
descriptors.label: Platform - Multiprotocol (Wi-Fi + BLE) on Micrium OS kernel
descriptors.description: This example provides a MicriumOS-based example using multiple protocols (Wi-Fi + BLE) to do something as simple as toggling LEDs.
